name: Loppy's Valentine
description:
Loppy needs to gather gifts for his valentine! He needs to craft a beautiful valentine, arrange a bouquet of flowers, and purchase some sweets for a snowy picnic! Help Loppy catch all of the sweets, flowers, and craft supplies in his picnic basket, but don't drop too much.

This game is a mini-game related to the upcoming top-down RPG "Booberries", releasing October 31, 2022. Please support the creators by donating, playing, and recording or streaming your gameplay. Your care and donations are what assures the development of Booberries to go more smoothly!

Art by Mimkitty

Writing by Mimkitty

Music & SFX by Mimkitty

Writing by Mimkitty

Character Design by Mimkitty & MountainSprout

Voice Acting by Steven Knickerbocker

Programming by Mimkitty, developed by GDevelop

Music made in Soundtrap, guitar in the track "Greenhouse" was set up by Mimkitty and then the rhythm was altered by AI.

Font is Futura Handwritten by Billy Snyder

Please donate! We are trying to raise funds for our business, our upcoming game (October 2022) and our livelihoods so we have the time (and the housing!) to complete these games.
